action.title: 运行环境测试
action.desc: 测试toolkit目录中核心组件是否生效
action.set: echo '-------------' echo '当前busybox版本：' busybox | grep BusyBox echo '' echo '-------------' echo '当前运行目录：' pwd echo '-------------' echo "service.sh状态 :" $TOOLKIT/service.sh about echo '-------------' echo "proot状态 :" export platform=$($TOOLKIT/service.sh platform) $TOOLKIT/proot-$platform --help echo '-------------' echo "chroot状态 :" $TOOLKIT/busybox chroot
